Sentencas: Solid oxide cells (SOCs) are promising for CO(2 )electrolysis.
Titulo: High reversible cycling performance of carbon dioxide electrolysis by flat-tube solid oxide cell

Sentencas: In this work, performance and stability of flat-tube SOCs during periodic cycles of CO(2 )electrolysis and hydrogen fuel discharge were studied.
Titulo: High reversible cycling performance of carbon dioxide electrolysis by flat-tube solid oxide cell

Sentencas: The cell underwent 26 reversible cycles of operation for 624 h. When the cell was electrolyzed with a current density of-200 mA/ cm(2 )at 1.07 V, the CO yield was 205.79 sccm and the CO2 conversion rate reached 45.7%.
Titulo: High reversible cycling performance of carbon dioxide electrolysis by flat-tube solid oxide cell

Sentencas: When the cell was operated in electrolysis mode, the degradation rate was 0.74 mV/h. Excluding the air heat consumption, the energy conversion efficiency was 81.42%; when the cell was operated at 0.6 slm hydrogen and +200 mA/cm(2), the degradation rate was 0.385 mV/h.
Titulo: High reversible cycling performance of carbon dioxide electrolysis by flat-tube solid oxide cell

Sentencas: Compared with long-term constant current electrolysis, the alternate operation of charge and discharge used in this study is more typical of the actual application conditions.
Titulo: High reversible cycling performance of carbon dioxide electrolysis by flat-tube solid oxide cell
